Message: The user completes the submission of the form

Hello, I'm a new advertiser on the platform and I'm trying to understand your ad policies. I would like to ask if you allow promoting software like Norton or TotalAV? Also would like to ask if there is a way to get an account manager? Thank you.

Hi there! Welcome to NewsBreak! Regarding your question about promoting software like Norton or TotalAV, I recommend checking out our Ad Policy document for detailed guidelines on what is allowed. You can find it here: [Ad Policy](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/25362604231053-Ad-Policy). 
As for getting an account manager, dedicated account management is reserved for advertisers who meet a daily spend threshold of $1,000 or more. If you’re not at that level yet, no worries — our self-serve platform has everything you need to launch and optimize your campaigns successfully. Our support team is also available via chat or email if you need any help. Let me know if you’d like assistance getting started!
Any chance you could verify this with the support team, before I topup money?

I understand your concern about verifying the ad policies before proceeding. Unfortunately, I can't directly verify this with the support team, but you can reach out to them at adsupport@newsbreak.com for confirmation and any specific questions you might have. They'll be able to provide detailed guidance tailored to your needs.
